amendment.description: To direct the Attorney General to create a publicly accessible database for trafficking victims advocates that contains information about services for trafficking survivors.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1126 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1126 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Wicker. (consideration: CR S2333-2337; text: CR S2334) To direct the Attorney General to create a publicly accessible database for trafficking victims advocates that contains information about services for trafficking survivors.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1126 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1126 proposed by Senator Cornyn for Senator Wicker.
